description: Input is a wrapper for custom inputs providing the label, helperText and errors.

children.description: Provide a children to the input
children.name: children

helperText.description: Provide text that is used alongside the control label for additional help
helperText.name: helperText

labelText.description:
Provide the text that will be read by a screen reader when visiting this
control @design
labelText.name: labelText

formItemClassName.description:
Provide a custom className that is applied directly to the underlying
<textarea> node
formItemClassName.name: formItemClassName

inputWrapperClassName.description:
Provide a custom className that is applied directly to the underlying
<textarea> node
inputWrapperClassName.name: inputWrapperClassName

hideLabel.description: Specify whether you want the underlying label to be visually hidden
hideLabel.name: hideLabel

invalid.description:
Specify whether the control is currently invalid.
Either a boolean in combination with `invalidText` or an `object`( eg. { message: "Message", 她therErrorProperties }) can be passed.
invalid.name: invalid

invalidText.description: Provide the text that is displayed when the control is in an invalid state @design
invalidText.name: invalidText

additional.description:
Provide the content that will be shown in addition to the label
(e.g. units, currency, etc.)
This content will be placed after the label @design
additional.name: additional

placeholder.description: Specify the placeholder attribute for the input @design
placeholder.name: placeholder

id.description: Provide a unique identifier for the control
id.name: id

name.description: Provide a name for the control
name.name: name

required.description:
Specify if the control is required @design
(sets aria-invalid as well)
required.name: required

disabled.description:
Specify if the control is disabled @design
(sets aria-disabled as well)
disabled.name: disabled

readOnly.description:
If the input is read-only, the user cannot change its value but focus
and tabIndex are still applied @design
(sets aria-readonly as well)
readOnly.name: readOnly

inline.description: Renders the input as inline element for horizontal forms
inline.name: inline

addonBefore.description:
Additional helper in front of the input, e.g. a currency symbol @design
(sets aria-describedby as well)
addonBefore.name: addonBefore

addonAfter.description:
Additional helper behind the input, e.g. a currency symbol @design
(sets aria-describedby as well)
addonAfter.name: addonAfter

type.name: { AddonBefore?: ComponentType<InputPropsForReplacementComponents>; AddonAfter?: ComponentType<InputPropsForReplacementComponents>; Label?: ComponentType<...>; HelperText?: ComponentType<...>; Error?: ComponentType<...>; }

calculatedId.description: The the ID of the element, uses the `name` prop if no `id` is provided. Make sure it is unique on the page.
calculatedId.name: calculatedId

helperTextClasses.description: The classes for the helper element
helperTextClasses.name: helperTextClasses

errorClasses.description: The classes for the error element
errorClasses.name: errorClasses

errorId.description: The id of the error. calculatedId + '-error-msg'
errorId.name: errorId

errorIcon.description: An icon for the error element
errorIcon.name: errorIcon

helperText.name: helperText

control @design

description:
Optionally provide the default value of the input @design

defaultValue?: string | number;
Input is a wrapper for custom inputs providing the label, helperText and errors.

className.description: Specify an optional className to be applied to the <input> node
className.name: className

defaultValue.description: Optionally provide the default value of the <input>
defaultValue.name: defaultValue

disabled.description: Specify whether the <input> should be disabled
disabled.name: disabled

inputClassName.description: Specify an optional className to be applied to the input node
inputClassName.name: inputClassName

inputWrapperClassName.description: Specify an optional className to be applied to the input wrapper node
inputWrapperClassName.name: inputWrapperClassName

labelText.description:
Provide the text that will be read by a screen reader when visiting this
control
labelText.name: labelText

onChange.description:
Optionally provide an `onChange` handler that is called whenever <input>
is updated
onChange.name: onChange

onClick.description:
Optionally provide an `onClick` handler that is called whenever the
<input> is clicked
onClick.name: onClick

placeholder.description: Specify the placeholder attribute for the <input>
placeholder.name: placeholder

hideLabel.description: Specify whether you want the underlying label to be visually hidden
hideLabel.name: hideLabel

invalid.description:
Specify whether the control is currently invalid.
Either a boolean in combination with `invalidText` or an `object`( eg. { message: "Message", 她therErrorProperties }) can be passed.
invalid.name: invalid

invalidText.description: Provide the text that is displayed when the control is in an invalid state
invalidText.name: invalidText

additional.description: Provide additional component that is used alongside the input for customization
additional.name: additional

helperText.description: Provide text that is used alongside the control label for additional help
helperText.name: helperText
